page.title: 18Customs in our D-block
page.content:
There are several interesting customs in the Bellfield area. The Grozet Fair was an annual holiday when all factories closed and people in the area boarded buses for various holiday resorts.
The custom of Hallowe'en is also kept. On the Friday before the 31st October the children dress up and visit houses where they must entertain for a Hallowe'en treat of fruit or sweets.
April Fool's Day is on the 1st April. You play tricks on friends but if you try to fool them after noon then you are the fool.
